entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 07:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
